```{r}
response_variable = "bioarea_mm2_per_ml"
```

```{r}
p_SL_biomass = plot.patches.points(ds_patches, 
                                   patch_type_input,
                                   response_variable) %>%
  print()

p_SL_biomass_2 = plot.patches.points(ds_patches, 
                                   patch_type_input = c("Small connected to large",
                                                        "Small isolated",
                                                        "Large connected to small",
                                                        "Large isolated"),
                                   response_variable) %>%
  print()

p_SL_biomass_3 = plot.patches.points(ds_patches, 
                                   patch_type_input = c("Small connected to large",
                                                        "Small connected to small",
                                                        "Small isolated",
                                                        "Large connected to large",
                                                        "Large connected to small",
                                                        "Large isolated"),
                                   response_variable,
                                   legend_row_n_input = 3) %>%
  print()


p_SL_biomass_presentations = plot.patches.points.presentations(ds_patches,
                                                               patch_type_input,
                                                               response_variable)
```
